text.section:
Without limiting its general authority, the department shall regulate:
The drilling and plugging of all wells;
The spacing or locating of wells; and
The use of vacuum.
The department shall make recommendations to the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency and the Energy and Environment Cabinet as to disposal of salt water and oil field wastes.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1905, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 9, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 103, sec. 8, effective June 16, 1960.
